IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility was not offered technical assistance.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility was not offered consultation.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this
licensing period.
An annual inspection was conducted 2/14/17. This inspection found no rule
violations.
There was one special investigation conducted since the last inspection.
Special Investigation 12/9/17 2018C0220002
It was reported by the agency that a teacher’s aide had inappropriate contact with a
Children’s Village resident. The school administrator terminated the aide when it was
determined the aide and the resident were passing personal notes. This consultant
determined that the school administrator and Children’s Village administration took
immediate and appropriate action upon gaining knowledge of the inappropriate
contact between the resident and teacher’s aide, thus providing for the continual
needs and protection of residents. There were no rule violations cited.
4

VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules. It is recommended that the facility be issued a renewal of their
regular license.
